author: wolstaeb
title: DAO Treasury Building Blocks
description: Raising and managing DAO funds in an accountable way is best done with smart contracts but that requires Plutus engineering expertise.
solution: A reusable module and SDK for bonding curves enable DApp developers to implement DAO treasury management and fair disbursements.
experience: Financial markets software engineering, cryptocurrency payments, start-ups, data & Govtech, impact investing. Organise legal-tech community.
